name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.


<Critical Multiplier: 133%>

<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>
<target action>
perform start
end
zoom: 150%, 30
camera screen: target, front center, 30
camera focus: target, front center, 30
wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>﻿
